sentences.en: After the testing and tryout, the intelligence and effect of the system win high praise unanimously.
sentences.cn: 经过测试和运行, 系统实现了人性化智能化的检索效果.

sentences.en: He called on all painters to take part in a tryout in his palace.
sentences.cn: 他召集了全国知名的画师到宫中来参加甄试.

sentences.en: In the tryout, there was a story.
sentences.cn: 在甄选画师的过程中, 发生了一段这样的故事.

sentences.en: It makes a helpful tryout to explore the regional architecture development under the latest technology condition.
sentences.cn: 为探索新技术条件下地区建筑学的发展做出有益的尝试.

sentences.en: Maybe you could purchase this sample for tryout the quality of us.
sentences.cn: 或者你可以先购买一套样品试一试我们的质量.

sentences.en: Next monday tryout for soccer team gonna officially start.
sentences.cn: 下星期一,足球队训练正式开始!

sentences.en: Participate in the original ( new ) material investigation and the tryout.
sentences.cn: 参与原 ( 新 ) 材料的调研及试用实施.

sentences.en: Presently, the networked product customization system is in tryout.
sentences.cn: 目前, 华洋电器产品网络化定制系统正在试用当中.

sentences.en: The new users to OTP are permitted to have a tryout free of charge.
sentences.cn: 网译平台新用户可以预先免费试用.

sentences.en: The tryout will have a direct impact on the smooth mold production cycle.
sentences.cn: 试模的顺利与否直接影响模具的生产周期.

sentences.en: Tryout fights for as long as they can last. Make sure they are the one apologize.
sentences.cn: 如果可以让战争持续久一点(也就是让人得到更多的折磨),并让最终让对方想你赔不是.

sentences.en: We are riding him pretty hard about going to this tryout.
sentences.cn: 我们都在极力鼓动他参加这次试训.

sentences.en: What type of a spike would be classified as a Dink - Unreturned with the proposed tryout system?
sentences.cn: 在这个排球队员选拔系统中,请解释[吊球成功]是什麽意思?

sentences.en: What type of a spike would be classified as a Kill with the proposed tryout system?
sentences.cn: 在这个排球队员选拔系统中,请解释[杀球得分]是什麽意思?

sentences.en: With Mark , the interviewer was eager to have him return for a tryout day.
sentences.cn: 可是招聘人员却迫切地要求Mark马上上岗试工.

words.tran_cn: 难受的；难堪的；费劲的；令人厌烦的
试图，努力；试验；审判；考验

trans.tran_en: a time when people who want to be in a sports team, activity etc are tested, so that the best can be chosen
